page.title: 19SPORT IN HOYLANDSWAINE
page.content:
Not many people in{Hoylandswaine}take part in sports. There are football and cricket teams. The{cricket}teams play on the field in the centre of the village. The cricket team has (A) and (B) teams. The captain of the (A) team is Aldred Bostwick and for the (B) team Bryan Tyas.
The{village school}has a netball team and football team. The netball team play a lot but the football team don't play much, but they play in a 6-a-side contest every year in June or July.
There is also{darts}and{pool}in the club, which has one team of each. The village{football}team play at a ground about 2.5 miles away near Cawthorne.
